public interface CLIState
Represents a state within the Command Line Interface (CLI) layer. This interface defines a behavior for applying state-specific logic with the provided arguments. Implementing classes are meant to encapsulate the logic for a particular state and interact with the CLI when transitioning, retaining, or performing actions related to this state.
